definition: of or denoting a person who assists physicians and nurses or is trained physicians and nurses in their activities, a person trained to assist medical professionals and to give emergency medical treatment
details:
adjective
- of or denoting a person who assists physicians and nurses or is trained physicians and nurses in their activities
= example: of or denoting a person who assists physicians and nurses or is trained physicians and nurses in their activities
noun
- a person trained to assist medical professionals and to give emergency medical treatment
= synonyms: paramedic
